metadata.title: CVE-2017-6060 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in jstest_main.c in mujstest in ArtifexSoftware, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via a crafted image.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
